scripts.watch: nodemon loader/server.js --watch output/Server*/**/* --watch output/Shared*/**/* & webpack --watch --progress --config webpack.development.config.js
scripts.build-production-client: npm run set-production && rm -rf dist && rm -rf output && spago build && webpack --progress --config webpack.production.config.js && webpack --progress --config webpack.landing.config.js
scripts.production-server: git checkout src/Shared/Environment.purs && git pull --no-edit && npm run set-production && npm install && spago build && webpack --progress --config webpack.landing.config.js && chmod +x ./inline-landing.sh && ./inline-landing.sh && pm2 restart server --update-env
